newsitem.title: USA: Freddie Mac to redeem $100 mln debenture issue.
newsitem.headline: Freddie Mac to redeem $100 mln debenture issue.

text.p: Freddie Mac said Friday that on July 7 it will redeem the entire $100 million principal amount of its 7.97 percent fixed-rate debenture issue.
The debentures were set to mature July 7, 2004 and have cusip number 313400M26. They will be redeemed at a price equal to 100 percent of the principal amount.
Payment of principal plus interest accrued to the redemption date will be made to shareholders of record as of the close of business on July 3, 1997, Freddie Mac said.
Freddie Mac is a corporation chartered by Congress that buys mortgages from lenders and packages them into securities for investors.
